name: Dill-and-Garlic Vodka
recipeIngredient:
1/2 cup loosely packed
dill, washed, patted
dry, tough stems
removed

recipeInstructions.text:
Put the dill, garlic and vodka in
an airtight glass container (like
a Mason jar).

Seal tightly and
refrigerate for 24 to 48 hours.

Strain into a glass pitcher; add
fresh sprigs of dill and a few
cucumber slices. Serve very cold.
